Package org.opendaylight.controller.clustering.services

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICacheUpdateAware<K,V>
    Interface that needs to be implemented by the components that want to be informed of an update in a Clustered Cache.
    IClusterContainerServices
    Set of services an application will expect from the clustering services provider.
    IClusterGlobalServices
    Set of services an application will expect from the clustering services provider.
    IClusterServices
    Set of services an application will expect from the clustering services provider
    IClusterServicesCommon
    This WILL NOT BE USED DIRECTLY, but VIA SUBCLASS Set of services and application will expect from the clustering services provider.
    ICoordinatorChangeAware
    Interface that needs to be implemented by who wants to be notified of coordinator role change
    IGetUpdates<K,V> Deprecated
    for internal use Interface that needs to be implemented by the listeners of updates received on data structure shared in the cluster
    IListenRoleChange
    Interface that needs to be implemented by who wants to be notified of newly active taking over.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IClusterServices.cacheMode
    Enumeration of the several modality with which a ConcurrentHashMap cache can be requested to the clustering services.
    IClusterServices.cacheProps
    Enumeration of the several properties that a cache can carry
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CacheConfigException
    Describe an exception that is raised when the cache being allocated has configuration errors, like mismatch parameters are passed and so on.
    CacheExistException
    Describe an exception that is raised when the cache being allocated already exists
    CacheListenerAddException
    Describe an exception that is raised when the cache Listener being added fails for any reason
    ListenRoleChangeAddException Deprecated
    for internal use The Class ListenRoleChangeAddException.
